items.title: Coffee ordering copilot
keypoints: Chat on Teams and instantly order over Azure cloud to barista at work with shortest wait
Teams and back-end connected through http, barista web order view and back-end conected through WebSockets for real time updates
Won the Microsoft Hackahon's Worldwide Special Mention Award and the Bay Area Employee Quality of Life Award

items.title: AI to accelerator compiler
keypoints: Wrote a compiler for supported neural network layers to automatically be offloaded to the NVIDIA Deep Learning Accelerator (NVDLA). Additionally, I leveraged the Glenside and ILA projects to automatically search the space of semantically identical neural networks to offload more operations to this accelerator
Won the Princeton Charles Ira Young Memorial Tablet and Medal for this research work (completed as part of my undergraduate thesis)

items.title: AI truck algorithms
keypoints: Coded trucks to navigate, whilst following road rules and avoiding static or dynamic obstacles
Won the design award for our algorithm achieving the most package pickups

items.title: ViewFormer-Faces
keypoints: Used a transformer approach to render a face at any arbitrary angle to the camera, given previous context angles

items.title: ML Water Level
keypoints: Created a neural network predict the depth of a river 14 days in the future given 49 days of historical depth, precipitation and temperature data

items.title: Autonomous person tracking RC car
keypoints: Wired and programmed a remote control car to autonomously follow a person using a custom Ultra-Wideband (UWB) positioning system we created in the lab
Developed a custom webapp to graph in real time the wirelessly received custom car data packets as they were logged to the Serial Monitor

items.title: Autonomous obstacle avoidance drone
keypoints: Developed PID and ILQR controllers for the drone as well as an obstacle avoidance algorithm using OpenCV and Tensorflow so the drone could autonomously navigate through a series of poles

items.title: Dorm Designer
keypoints: Created a website for students to virtually trial furniture arrangements in their dorm and share their designs with their roommates. All furniture is automatically scaled to the right size and the amount of furniture left to add is also shown.

items.title: TAIlor Swift
keypoints: Using GPT3 and analysis of previous Taylor Swift songs generated melody and lyrics for a song that algorithmically ought to be succesful

items.title: Verilog PUNC Viewer
keypoints: Whilst a TA for the ELE Contemporary Logic Design course during the first year of Covid, I created a series of web apps to help students debug their Verilog code
The final project whose debugger I have linked was to design a chip. The webapp allowed them analyse their test files and check memory and register values

items.title: Software Engineer at Microsoft
keypoints: Algorithmic optimisation of infrastructure to increase resiliency to failure and decrease latency
Leading redesign of 10,000 line internal solution and co-leading new external library for next generation of Microsoft Specialised
Developing LLM chat app for searching internal docs + using machine learning to predict when machines will fail and why

items.title: Software Engineer Intern at Microsoft
keypoints: Developed a novel compressor using .NET and C# to compress the hundreds of petabytes of PDFs in OneDrive and SharePoint by 19%

items.title: OA Leader and TA at Princeton University
keypoints: Led 4.5 day orientation backpacking trip for 10 incoming students
Spearheaded the development of 4 processor debugging [web apps](https://github.com/ThomasDh-C/VerilogPUNCViewer) for the ELE Contemporary Logic Design course with around 100 students
Co-Lead TA for ELE Contemporary Logic Design course as second year TA
Graded weekly assignments for introductory computer science class in Java
Created a network of 12 3D printers for Princeton School of Architecture to allow graduate students to rapidly prototype

items.title: Machine Learning Intern at Elsevier
keypoints: Developed machine learning algorithms to classify papers into the UN's Sustainable Development Goals
Increased recall by 7x while maintaining the precision of the previous best method

items.title: Software Engineer Intern at Concentra
keypoints: Streamlined the home page for HR web app using TypeScript and React JS to allow for client branding as well as make their onboarding progress clear
Built a proof of concept web app to show an organization's HR relationships in 3D and demonstrate the power of our offering at initial sales meetings

items.title: Co-founder at SureLight Tech
keypoints: Co-founded a smart bike light company and won the international JA Europe entrepreneurship competition out of 340,000 students
Ran a Kickstarter for our latest patent-pending product - won 'Project We Love' award

items.title: Software Engineer Intern at Splitit
keypoints: Wrote Python programs to analyze web technologies and other site data
Optimized program to run on multiple machines simultaneously for over 20,000 leads. My solution allowed 2 other interns to work on other tasks

items.title: Research Intern at SiMMS Lab (ICL)
keypoints: Worked every Wednesday afternoon of senior year in high school
Co-authored a soft-haptics paper to train doctors using Microsoft HoloLens and HTC Vive. Programs written in Python and C#

items.title: Co-founder at Firefly Racing
keypoints: Co-founded a full-size electric racing car team and won the international IET Design Engineering Award against several universities
Led the design of 3 cars and grew the team to over 50 students
